document_data.mainbody:
Archmeagan was an arcanist of ancient Netheril who lived in Eileanar, the Karsus Enclave, until its destruction in .
When Archmeagans close friend Parzal the Outrageous was imprisoned after dealing with his traitorous partner Mortimar, she took temporary ownership of his QM III business. He intended to take control of the business again on his release, but chose to take a long vacation outside of Netheril that meant that he survived Karsuss Follyâ€”unlike Archmeagan.
